movies.title: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.plot: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.
movies.awards: Nominated for 7 Oscars. Another 19 wins & 30 nominations.

movies.title: The Dark Knight
movies.plot: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc on Gotham City, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.
